comments.author: veggies.2178
comments.body: I used php tooltips before on guild site but ended up conflicting with other modules, what we need is login to phpbb with gw2 api key

comments.author: mahri.8410
comments.body:
Hi. I have found an add-on for phpBB that shows descriptions of various items, and I tought that support for Guild Wars 2 could be added by implementing Guild Wars 2 API.
Here is the link for the add-on GitHub repository:
https://github.com/PayBas/GameTooltips

It would be nice to see more Guild Wars 2 community forums having this feature.
